metadata.title: CVE-2019-2109 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In MakeMPEG4VideoCodecSpecificData of AVIExtractor.cpp, there is a possibleout of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead toremote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions:Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1. AndroidID: A-130651570.

criterions.comment: android package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
